author: sctemme
msg: Clean up debug logging to the error log. This code is only compiled when
Apache (and hence apxs) is compiled with -DDEBUG, so you usually don't see
it. I took the macro in the header file from the 1.3 module and set the
status parameter to 0... I don't see this value show up in the output so
I guess that's OK. Tested on Darwin 6.6 and Solaris 7.

author: rederpj
msg: Added a warning to the AcceptMutex directive documentation indicating
that the pthread option can result in a non-responsive server on
systems that can't reclaim a locked mutex from the segfaulted child

author: jerenkrantz
msg: The new ASF creed: "Why not just randomize the votes as well?"
Fix up some bogus revision information while I'm at it.

author: joes
msg: Add note regarding interrupted uploads: $r->status doesn't detect this situation.
